sentences.en: an exit door
sentences.cn: 出口门

sentences.en: France’s early exit from the World Cup
sentences.cn: 法国队在世界杯上的早早出局

sentences.en: Go north on I-15 to the exit just past Barstow.
sentences.cn: 沿着15号州际公路一直向北，一过巴斯托就从出口驶出。

sentences.en: Go straight through that door under the EXIT sign.
sentences.cn: 从“安全出口”标志下的那道门直穿过去。

sentences.en: He exited the courtroom in a fury.
sentences.cn: 他怒气冲冲地离开了审判室。

sentences.en: He picked up the case and walked towards the exit.
sentences.cn: 他提起箱子，向出口走去。

sentences.en: Her exit seemed suitably dramatic.
sentences.cn: 她的退场很富戏剧性，但似乎又是在情理之中。

sentences.en: His farewell speech marked his exit from politics.
sentences.cn: 他的告别演说是他退出政界的标志.

sentences.en: People were trampled underfoot in the rush for the exit.
sentences.cn: 有人在拼命涌向出口时被踩在脚下。

sentences.en: Press Exit to return to your document.
sentences.cn: 按“退出”返回文档。

sentences.en: She made a dart for the exit.
sentences.cn: 她冲向出口.

sentences.en: Take the A422 exit at Old Stratford.
sentences.cn: 从旧斯特拉福特的A422号出口出来。

sentences.en: The exit doors were locked shut.
sentences.cn: 紧急出口被锁上了。

sentences.en: The exit of the tunnel is concealed.
sentences.cn: 地道的出口开在隐秘的地方.

sentences.en: The heroine made her exit to great applause.
sentences.cn: 女主角在热烈的掌声中退场。

sentences.en: There is a fire exit on each floor of the building.
sentences.cn: 这栋建筑每层楼都有个消防通道。

sentences.en: There was a stampede for the exit.
sentences.cn: 大家都争先恐后地朝出口涌去。

sentences.en: They escaped through an emergency exit and called the police.
sentences.cn: 他们从紧急出口逃脱，并报了警。

sentences.en: They made a quick exit when they saw the police approaching.
sentences.cn: 他们看见警察来了便迅速离去。

sentences.en: They made a rush for the exit.
sentences.cn: 他们猛然冲向出口处.

sentences.en: To exit from this page, press the return key.
sentences.cn: 退出本页面按返回键。

sentences.en: Two men were blocking her exit.
sentences.cn: 两个男人挡住了她出去的路。

sentences.en: We made for the nearest exit.
sentences.cn: 我们走向最近的出口。

phrases.tran_cn: 退出策略；回收策略；退出投资策略
安全出口，紧急出口；火警出口，消防安全门

trans.tran_en: a door or space through which you can leave a public room, building etc
to stop using a computer program
